content: the double_crochet stripes hat is a crocheted hat with raised ridges alternating with rounds of double_crochet to create a nice texture the hat is worked top down and finished with a post stitch ribbing an optional faux fur pom pom can be added at the end to finish it off the hat pattern comes with instructions for the hat in 5 different sizes- adult child toddler 6-12 month baby and 3-6 month baby the hats are made with worsted weight yarn samples made with red heart super saver and loops & threads impeccable finished size adult child toddler 6-12 month and 3-6 month supplies worsted weight yarn in desired color 1 crochet hook 5 5 mm yarn needle optional- faux fur pom pom
